analysis.description:
BalanceTracker.walletMap (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc1bcc29edf605095bf4fe7a953b7c115ecc8cad.sol#1429) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- get (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc1bcc29edf605095bf4fe7a953b7c115ecc8cad.sol#1461-1467)
	- getByIndices (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc1bcc29edf605095bf4fe7a953b7c115ecc8cad.sol#1477-1486)
	- getAll (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc1bcc29edf605095bf4fe7a953b7c115ecc8cad.sol#1494-1502)
	- idsCount (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc1bcc29edf605095bf4fe7a953b7c115ecc8cad.sol#1510-1518)
	- hasId (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc1bcc29edf605095bf4fe7a953b7c115ecc8cad.sol#1527-1535)
	- set (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc1bcc29edf605095bf4fe7a953b7c115ecc8cad.sol#1544-1564)
	- setIds (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc1bcc29edf605095bf4fe7a953b7c115ecc8cad.sol#1572-1586)
	- add (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc1bcc29edf605095bf4fe7a953b7c115ecc8cad.sol#1595-1615)
	- sub (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc1bcc29edf605095bf4fe7a953b7c115ecc8cad.sol#1624-1641)
	- hasInUseCurrency (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc1bcc29edf605095bf4fe7a953b7c115ecc8cad.sol#1649-1656)
	- hasEverUsedCurrency (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc1bcc29edf605095bf4fe7a953b7c115ecc8cad.sol#1664-1671)
	- fungibleRecordsCount (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc1bcc29edf605095bf4fe7a953b7c115ecc8cad.sol#1679-1685)
	- fungibleRecordByIndex (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc1bcc29edf605095bf4fe7a953b7c115ecc8cad.sol#1695-1702)
	- fungibleRecordByBlockNumber (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc1bcc29edf605095bf4fe7a953b7c115ecc8cad.sol#1712-1719)
	- lastFungibleRecord (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc1bcc29edf605095bf4fe7a953b7c115ecc8cad.sol#1727-1733)
	- nonFungibleRecordsCount (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc1bcc29edf605095bf4fe7a953b7c115ecc8cad.sol#1741-1747)
	- nonFungibleRecordByIndex (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc1bcc29edf605095bf4fe7a953b7c115ecc8cad.sol#1757-1764)
	- nonFungibleRecordByBlockNumber (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc1bcc29edf605095bf4fe7a953b7c115ecc8cad.sol#1774-1781)
	- lastNonFungibleRecord (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc1bcc29edf605095bf4fe7a953b7c115ecc8cad.sol#1789-1795)

BalanceTracker.add (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc1bcc29edf605095bf4fe7a953b7c115ecc8cad.sol#1595-1615) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-walletMap[wallet].nonFungibleBalanceByType[_type].add(value,currencyCt,currencyId) (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc1bcc29edf605095bf4fe7a953b7c115ecc8cad.sol#1606-1608)

BalanceTracker.sub (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc1bcc29edf605095bf4fe7a953b7c115ecc8cad.sol#1624-1641) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-walletMap[wallet].nonFungibleBalanceByType[_type].sub(value,currencyCt,currencyId) (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc1bcc29edf605095bf4fe7a953b7c115ecc8cad.sol#1635-1637)

Servable.isRegisteredActiveService (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc1bcc29edf605095bf4fe7a953b7c115ecc8cad.sol#412-418) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- isRegisteredService(service) && block.timestamp >= registeredServicesMap[service].activationTimestamp (/unique_chucks/42/0xbc1bcc29edf605095bf4fe7a953b7c115ecc8cad.sol#417)
